column4:
このあたりの建物を、
全部どこか遠くに
運んで！！
column5: Please move all of the nearby buildings somewhere far away from here!
column11: Please move all of the buildings on this side to some place far away from here!!

column4:
何もない中に、この店だけ
ポツンと建ってるのが理想なの！
column5: If our store is the only thing left standing in the middle of nothing, it'd be ideal!
column11: If our store is the only thing left standing the middle of nothing, it'd be ideal!

column4:
やっぱり、売り上げは
かんばしくないってわけか？
column5: Is your shop still not making money after all?
column11: Is the store's profit still no good after all?

column4: うまくいかないもんだな。
column5: Well, I guess there's no way it could've gone that smoothly.
column11: Well, I guess there was no way it was going to go so smoothly.

column4:
いっそ、このあたりの建物を、
全部どこか遠くに
運んでくれないかな？
column5: Couldn't you move all of the buildings nearby to somewhere far away?
column11: Couldn't you move all of the buildings nearby to somewhere far away?

column4:
何もない中に、この店だけ
ポツンと建ってれば、
イヤでも目立つし……。
column5: If there was nothing but the store all by itself, it'd really stand out...
column11: If there was nothing but the store stood all by itself, it'd really stand out...

column4:
いくらなんでも
やりすぎだって！
column5: You're asking for WAY too much!
column11: You're asking for way too much!

column4:
オートマンが暴れたせいで、
そうなることは
あるかもしれないけど。
column5: If there were Automen on the rampage, we might have been able to do it, but...
column11: If there were Automen on the rampage, we might have been able to do it.

column4:
都合よくオートマンが
来るはずないしな。
column5: I don't think the Automen are going to just pop up that conveniently.
column11: But, I don't think the Automen are just going to show up that convienently.
